tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE mediation_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_date DATE,
  mediator_name VARCHAR(50),
  participant1_name VARCHAR(50),
  participant2_name VARCHAR(50),
  session_duration INT,
  outcome_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE mediation_sessions (
  session_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  mediator VARCHAR(50),
  participants JSON,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE mediation_sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  mediator_name VARCHAR(50),
  participants TEXT,
  outcome TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE mediation_sessions (
    session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mediator_id UUID,
    client_id UUID,
    session_date DATE,
    session_duration INTERVAL,
    outcome TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE mediation_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mediator_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    participant_name VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_session_id FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES mediation_sessions(session_id)
);

CREATE TABLE outcomes (
    outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    outcome_description TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_session_id FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES mediation_sessions(session_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_participant_id FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    document_name VARCHAR(100),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_session_id FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES mediation_sessions(session_id)
);
